biography: Sanne is a fast, clever, and energetic developer who brings Katje's services to the palm of your hand. As the team's Mobile App Developer, she is fluent in the languages of both iOS and Android, crafting native applications that are fast, responsive, and intuitive. She has a strong opinion on everything from API design to pixel-perfect layouts and is obsessed with creating the smoothest possible user experience. She lives on caffeine and the satisfaction of a perfectly executed app release.

facial.skinColor: fair, with a prominent spray of freckles across her nose and cheeks

piercings: A small silver ring on the right side of her lip.

chest.description: Small, perky A-cup breasts with pale areolae.

bodyDetails.abdomen: Slender and flat. Navel is a small 'innie'.
bodyDetails.arms: Slim, with a constellation of light freckles.
bodyDetails.hands: Nimble fingers, always moving. Nails are often bitten.

disadvantages: Hates waiting for code to compile
quirks: Has strong opinions about mobile OS design
Can type surprisingly fast on her phone
Tests her apps in real-world scenarios constantly
Probably has the latest smartphone model

relationships.katje-05: Her indispensable partner in app design
relationships.katje-10: Relies on her to manage app release schedules
